pr_title: [BEAM-10831] Fix broken Beam Dependency Check Report

timeline.message: [BEAM-10831] Fix broken Beam Dependency Check Report
fixup! [BEAM-10831] Fix broken Beam Dependency Check Report

timeline.bodyText: For my education, what does this do?
timeline.author: tvalentyn

replies.bodyText: 🙀  good point @tvalentyn . It is unwanted leftover from testing it on another Jenkins with some additional changes in CommonJobProperties. I deleted it in recent fixup.
replies.author: TobKed

replies.bodyText:
For testing purposes on testing Jenkins jobs were disabled.
It refers to this method:
https://jenkinsci.github.io/job-dsl-plugin/#method/javaposse.jobdsl.dsl.jobs.WorkflowJob.disabled
replies.author: TobKed

timeline.message: fixup! fixup! [BEAM-10831] Fix broken Beam Dependency Check Report
